title: Rust 1.17 regresssion - lithos

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
```
[~/code/lithos[tag: v0.7.0]] $ CARGO_TARGET_DIR=beta cargo +beta build                                                                                                                                                                                 [alex@acrichton-desktop]
   Compiling lithos v0.7.0 (file:///home/alex/code/lithos)
error: could not find native static library `container`, perhaps an -L flag is missing?

error: Could not compile `lithos`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
[~/code/lithos[tag: v0.7.0]] $ rustc +beta -vV                                                                                                                                                                                                         [alex@acrichton-desktop]
rustc 1.17.0-beta.2 (b7c276653 2017-03-20)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: b7c27665307704a9b158fe242e88e83914029415
commit-date: 2017-03-20
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.17.0-beta.2
LLVM version: 3.9
[~/code/lithos[tag: v0.7.0]] $ git log -1                                                                                                                                                                                                              [alex@acrichton-desktop]
commit 0c632a0e764fe000d1daf5e2e0388af06bf8c0f4
Author: Paul Colomiets <paul@colomiets.name>
Date:   Mon Mar 20 15:20:38 2017 +0200

    Version bumped to v0.7.0
```

https://github.com/tailhook/lithos

cc @tailhook
